title: LF Club specifically for Western Australian Players
body:
Hey guys as the title suggests I'm hoping to find a club for West Aussies to congregate. I'd love to meet and play with more local people. It'd be sick to see a Perth based OPL team one day but alas it could all start with a West Australian club!

I'd be open to even making a club myself just wanted to see how many would be interested first though! =)

replies.body: u can join our club! http://curtinleaguesociety.wix.com/rengar thats our website and we also have a facebook group https://www.facebook.com/curtinleaguesociety/ we are mainly based in wa. Once u sign up on the website ill add u on Satnaav and add u to the club!

I was going to join, because I also go to Curtin(live across the road too!) but I'm not too sure about the $5 registration fee >.<

I just want to join for some casual premades, don't necessarily care about competitive.

I didn't even think other people in WA knew of the internet, nevermind LoL~
In all seriousness though it would be nice to see something WA based propping up. 

Took a look at Pinsir's ad, but despite being a Curtin student, I'm not interested in randomly providing my name and phone to some random group. xD
So yeah, if anyone's got something more casual going, would be nice to hear from you.
are you open to anyone or just if you go to curtin? I'm not going to enroll just to join a lol club lol!
